content:
Just noticed https://docs.fire.ly/firelyserver/releasenotes/releasenotes.html#release-4-1-0 in the Firely release notes -- it's a good reminder to all server developers about subtleties of enforcing policies for access to resources with patient/ scopes (TL;DR: need to be careful about traversing links across resources that belong to more than one compartment.)

FYI @Christiaan Knaap for discussion (this was a great catch and call-out).
